data.news_body: In Continuation to our letter dated 22 October 2022 the Company had organized a conference call with the Investors/ Analysts on Thursday, 27 October 2022 at 12:30 Hrs (IST). A copy of Transcript of conference call held with the Investors/ Analysts is enclosed herewith and the same has also been uploaded on the Company''s Website at www.dodladairy.com.
